question: The "White Lotus Rebellion" happened in which nation?
explanation: The "White Lotus Rebellion" was a rebellion started by the followers of the White Lotus movement during the rule of the Qing Dynasty in China. It started in 1794 and ended in 1804. White Lotus was a religious and political movement promoting and propagating the worship of Wusheng Laomu. This movement found major support among the Han Chinese. This rebellion was finally crushed by the Qing rulers in 1804.
